alert.note: Alert for Geneva (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 31 at 5:45PM CDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of western Geneva County in Southeast Alabama through 630 PM CDT... At 545 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Samson, or 8 miles northwest of Geneva, moving west at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Geneva, Samson, Coffee Springs, Earlytown, Hacoda, Chancellor, Spears, Pera, Eunola, Weeks, Sellersville, Lytle, Marl, Logan Field Municipal A/P, Geneva Municipal A/P, Vaughanville, Ganer, Lowery and Somerset. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
